abstract: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, cut $1 million more off the asking price of his Chicago mansion.
snippet: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, cut $1 million more off the asking price of his Chicago mansion.
lead_paragraph: Think the real estate bust has been tough for everyone? Just ask Jamie Dimon.

headline.main: For Jamie Dimon, a Sinking Feeling About Housing
